thoughts.text: The 'google' command returned several links to articles about the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Dai'ichi nuclear power plant. I want to read more about the scientific studies that have been conducted on this topic, so I will use the 'browse_website' command to visit the website of the National Library of Medicine and read a scientific article.

args.question: What is the scientific consensus on the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Dai'ichi nuclear power plant?
